<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Snagging Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=361) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 145 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=127) (Level 4)

**Requirements**
You have one hand free, and your target is within reach of that hand.

</column>

---

You combine an attack with quick grappling moves to throw an enemy off balance as long as it stays in your reach. Make a Strike while keeping one hand free. If this Strike hits, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of your next turn or until it's no longer within the reach of your hand, whichever comes first.
name: Snagging Strike
requirement: You have one hand free, and your target is within reach of that hand.
